title: Sugar Hotel Signage
content:
Hello All,

I was wondering if anyone could shed some light on this mystery typeface. It spells out the word “sugar” in the picture. The inset is slightly enlarged.

Thanks.

James

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sugarsample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=sugarsample.jpg) | 113.05 KB |
author: James Gareth

comments.content: Thanks for the response, Dav. Glad to see you’re still here. It’s been really busy (insane?) at work so I don’t get to check in often. I think that’s pretty accurate especially considering that lowercase g. Nice spot! I was hoping this was just a stock font since I really dig that lowercase s.
